mainText:
Much will be said about Steve Job's contributions that have touched all 
of us - Macs; iPods; iPhones; iPads.  To my mind probably the most 
important legacy of Steve Jobs (and Apple) is his contribution to 
education.  From grade school to university Apple represents the best 
marriage of technology and learning.  As an educator and scholar, I am 
indebted to Steve Jobs for helping to create tools that have enlivened 
my classes and strengthened my research.  His genius will continue to 
touch us all.
author: James
